TapeQualityAssessor.assess_dropouts¶

TapeQualityAssessor.assess_dropouts() → quality_assessment.data_types.QualityReport[source]¶

Assesses if drop-outs meet the specs.

Raises

ValueError – Exception if drop-outs are not in TapeSpecs

Returns

Quality report on drop-outs.

Return type

QualityReport
